review: I'm actually quite pleased with the Amazon Fire TV. Its compact unit allows for easy display and setup was simple and quick. No longer having to steam through my laptop frees me up to do my work for my job on the computer  while directly streaming movies and tv episodes to my television. The remote control with voice command is a wonderful feature that helps weed through excess  programming when I have an idea of what I want to view or listen to immediately.  The one and only reason I did not give this device five stars is because it requires a power source to work. I've become a lot more conscious of the environment and more frugal on utility expenses and because of this, I would have preferred the necessary connections not to have required an additional pull of electricity. However, it is still recommendable.
author: Zelly
